participant_1.name: Jack Thompson
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and introspective with a hint of humor
participant_1.background: i am a recovering alcoholic. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i am a 45 year old male. i now live in the city. i grew up on a farm.

participant_2.name: Evelyn Bright
participant_2.personality: vibrant and whimsical, with a zest for life
participant_2.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i am very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever.
